XXvabhdicu:2848: yaccānantarotpanno vimuktimārgaḥ, yaccānāgataṃ bhāvyate, yacca tatprahāṇaṃ tadbalena hi tatprāptyupattiḥ |
XXvabhdicu:2849: adhipatiphalaṃ svabhāvādanye sarvasaṃskārāḥ pūrvotpanna varjjā iti draṣṭavyam |
XXvabhdicu:2852: yattu nirmalaprahāṇamārge karma taccaturbhiḥ phalaiḥ saphalaṃ vipākaphalaṃ muktvā |
XXvabhdicu:2854: yaccākuśalaṃ tadapi caturbhireva phalaiḥ saphalaṃ visaṃyogaphalaṃ tyaktvā
XXvabhdicu:2856: śeṣaṃ punaranāsravaṃ yatprahāṇamārgādanyat, yaccāvyākṛtaṃ tattribhirvipākavisaṃyogaphalaṃ muktvā |
XXvabhdicu:2857: phalaṃ śubhasya catvāri dve trīṇi ca śubhādayaḥ // Abhidh-d_207 //
XXvabhdicu:2858: kuśalasya karmaṇaḥ kuśalā dharmāścatvāri phalāni vipākaphalaṃ hitvā |
XXvabhdicu:2861: śubhādyāstvaśubhasya dve trīṇi catvāri ca kramāt /
XXvabhdicu:2862: akuśalasya karmaṇaḥ kuśalā dharmā dve puruṣakārādhipatiphale |
XXvabhdicu:2868: avyākṛtasya te tu dve trīṇi trīṇi śubhādayaḥ // Abhidh-d_208 //
XXvabhdicu:2869: avyākṛtasya karmaṇaḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ dve puruṣakārādhipatiphale |
XXvabhdicu:2878: vartamānāstu dharmā vartamānasya karmaṇaḥ dve puruṣakārādhipatiphale |
XXvabhdicu:2879: ajātasya tvajātā dharmāstrīṇi phalāni niṣyandavisaṃyogaphale hitvā ||
XXvabhdicu:2881: svabhūmikā dharmāḥ karmaṇo yathāsaṃbhavaṃ catvāri phalāni visaṃyogaphalaṃ hitvā |
XXvabhdicu:2882: anyabhūmikā dharmāḥ te cedanāsravāstrīṇi, vipākavisaṃyogaphale hitvā |
XXvabhdicu:2886: śaikṣasya karmaṇaḥ śaikṣā dharmāstrīṇi phalāni, vipākavisaṃyogaphale
XXvabhdicu:2890: aśaikṣasya tu karmaṇaḥ ekaṃ trīṇi dvayaṃ caiva śaikṣādyāḥ paścimasya tu /
XXvabhdicu:2891: dve dve pañca yathāsaṃkhyaṃ aśaikṣasya khalu karmaṇaḥ śaikṣā dharmā ekamadhipatiphalam, aśaikṣāstrīṇi vipākāvisaṃyogaphale hitvā |
XXvabhdicu:2893: naivaśaikṣānāśaikṣāṇāṃ punaḥ śaikṣā dharmā dve puruṣākārādhipatiphale |
XXvabhdicu:2897: trīṇi catvāri caikaṃ ca dṛṣṭiheyādayaḥ smṛtāḥ /
XXvabhdicu:2898: darśanaheyasya khalu karmaṇaḥ darśanaheyā dharmāstrīṇi phalāni,
XXvabhdicu:2902: te tvabhyāsapraheyasya dve catvāri tridhā matāḥ // Abhidh-d_212 //
XXvabhdicu:2904: bhāvanāheyasya khalu karmaṇo darśanaheyā dharmāḥ dve,
XXvabhdicu:2908: apraheyasya tu karmaṇo darśanaprahātavyā dharmā ekamadhipatiphalam |
XXvabhdicu:2912: atha kimekaṃ karmaikaṃ janmākṣipati, athānekam ? tadādarśyate-
XXvabhdicu:2916: tadyathā citrakara ekayā vartyā katsnaṃ rūpamākṣipati, bahvībhiḥ paripūrayati tadvaditi |
XXvabhdicu:2917: atha yaduktaṃ bhagavatā- "karmasvako 'yaṃ bhikṣavo lokaḥ" iti |
XXvabhdicu:2920: svaṃ kāyavāṅmanaskarma sā karmasvakatā matā // Abhidh-d_214 //
XXvabhdicu:2921: yatkhalu kāyavāṅmanaskarma svayaṃ kṛtaṃ kuśalākuśalamabhyatītaṃ dadatphalaṃ sā karmasvakatā draṣṭavyā ||
XXvabhdicu:2922: kathaṃ punaḥ pratikṣaṇabhidureṣu saṃskāreṣu parasparākṛtasaṅketeṣu satsu,
XXvabhdicu:2923: asati ca nitye kartari bhoktari ca karmasvakatābhidhīyate ? tadatra
XXvabhdicu:2926: kartṛtā bhoktṛtā coktā niṣiddhā śāśvatasya tu // Abhidh-d_215 //
XXvabhdicu:2929: śāśvate tvātmani niṣkriye pūrvapaścādviśeṣābhāvāt kartṛtvaṃ cātyantāpadhvastayuktividhānam
XXvabhdicu:2930: skandhasantāne tu viśiṣṭaskandhāntarotpattau satyāṃ bījajalābhiṣekādyanugrahād viśiṣṭaphalotpattivaditi
XXvabhdicu:2934: syātkhalu karmasvakatā nāpi ca tasya karmaṇo vipāke 'vasthita iti catuṣkoṭikā |
XXvabhdicu:2936: yadi tasya karmaṇaḥ phale 'vasthitastacca karma vihīnaṃ bhavati ||
XXvabhdicu:2944: tṛtīyā dvayasadbhāvā caturthī tūbhayaṃ vinā // Abhidh-d_219 //
XXvabhdicu:2947: syātkhalu karmaṇā samanvāgato na ca tasya karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ vedayate |
XXvabhdicu:2951: tṛtīyā dvayamuktasya caturthī tu dvayādṛte // Abhidh-d_221 //
XXvabhdicu:2952: atha yadidaṃ śāstre yogavihitamayogavihitaṃ ca karmoktaṃ tasya kiṃ lakṣaṇam ? tadabhidhīyate-
XXvabhdicu:2955: yatkiñcitkhalu kliṣṭaṃ kāyavāṅmanaskarma kleśopakleśadūṣitaṃ sarvaṃ tadayogavihitama, ayoniśomanaskārasamutthāpitatvāt
XXvabhdicu:2957: yatkhalu śikṣāvyapetaṃ yathā gantavyaṃ sthātavyamityevamādi, yattu liṅgavacanahīnamasaṃbaddhaṃ nirarthakaṃ ca vākkarma tadayogavihitam |
XXvabhdicu:2960: abhidharmadīpe vibhāṣāprabhāyāṃ vṛttau caturthasyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ
XXvabhdicu:2962: athaitāṃ paramagambhīrāṃ duravabodhāṃ prakṛtipuruṣeśvarādikudarśanatimirotsādanakarīṃ karmasvakatāṃ kaḥ svayamabhisaṃbuddhya lokānugrahāya pradarśayatīti ? brūmaḥ |
XXvabhdicu:2964: sa punaḥ kiṃ cittotpādātprabhṛti bodhisattvo bhavati ? atha
XXvabhdicu:2965: lākṣaṇikakarmākṣepeṇa, āhosviccaramabhavika iti ? ata idaṃ prastūyate-
XXvabhdicu:2968: yataḥ prabhṛti kalyāṇamitraṃ bhagavantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhamāpadya tadupadarśitadakṣiṇamārgaḥ yoniśo manasikārādhiṣṭhitabuddhiḥ kṛtsnaṃ lokamatrāṇamaśaraṇamaparāyaṇaṃ pañcagatimahāvarte
XXvabhdicu:2972: mohakarṇadhāraparibhrāmitabuddhinauke saṃsāramahāsamudre nimagnamavalokya kṛpāviṣṭacetāstadabhyuddharaṇāya vīryabāhumabhiprasārya, avivartyaṃ
XXvabhdicu:2975: pratighabhujaṅgadaṃṣṭrā viṣadūṣito 'yaṃ lokaḥ sa mayā maitryāgadena praśamitavyaḥ |
XXvabhdicu:2976: tṛṣṇāpiśācīlalitābhibhūtamatirayaṃ lokaḥ sa mayā śamathabalena tṛṣṇānirodhasukhaṃ lambhayitavyaḥ
XXvabhdicu:2978: 'yaṃ lokaḥ sa mayā vimokṣasukhasvastyayanena nirbhayamamṛtapadaṃ praveśayitavyaḥ |
XXvabhdicu:2979: mānagiriśikharādhirūḍhabuddhirayaṃ lokaḥ sa mayā karmasvakatājñānavajreṇa mānagirīnvicūrṇya praśāntamānamadāmarśaśāntipade sthāpayitavyaḥ |
XXvabhdicu:2984: śraddhādiguṇadhanadaridro 'yaṃ lokaḥ sa mayā bodhyaṅgaratnakhacite mahati guṇaiśvaryapade sanniveśayitavyaḥ |
XXvabhdicu:2986: yattarhi śāstra uktam- "bodhisattvaḥ kutaḥ prabhṛti ? yato lakṣaṇavaipākyaṃ karma karoti" iti |
XXvabhdicu:2992: yadā khalvayaṃ puruṣatvajātismaratvādiṣu padasthāneṣu niyatībhato bhavati-
XXvabhdicu:2997: pracinoti tadādhāraṃ kāyaṃ kalpaśatena tu // Abhidh-d_226 //
XXvabhdicu:2999: dviṣatāmapi yaṃ dṛṣṭvā manaḥ sadyaḥ prasīdati // Abhidh-d_227 //
XXvabhdicu:3000: eṣā khalu dharmatā yattribhiḥ kalpāsaṃkhyeyairanirastaśraddhāśīlaśrutatyāgaprajñādiguṇadhanaiśvaryaprayogānāṃ bhagavatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ puruṣottamānāṃ dharmakāyacaraṇaparisamāptirbhavati |
XXvabhdicu:3005: yatpunarjanmaśarīraṃ bhagavatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ bodherāśrayabhūtaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ
XXvabhdicu:3123: atha tadādyaṃ bodhicittaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dāḍharyeṇa kathamiva draṣṭavyam ?
XXvabhdicu:3127: vajreṇa dhvasyate vajramavikāri tu tanmanaḥ // Abhidh-d_228 //
XXvabhdicu:3128: kiṃ paryāpannam, katarat, kati prakāram, kiṃ purassaram, kasminvā kāle ko
XXvabhdicu:3131: buddhotpāde naraḥ strī vā tadādyaṃ cittamaśnute // Abhidh-d_229 //
XXvabhdicu:3137: manuṣyo vā strī votpādayati nānya iti |
XXvabhdicu:3139: kathaṃ punaḥ krameṇa dānādipāramitānāṃ paripūrirbhavati ? tatra tāvat-
XXvabhdicu:3141: prathame khalvasaṃkhyeye vartamāno bodhisattvaḥ na sarvasmai nāpi sarvaṃ na sarvadā dadāti
XXvabhdicu:3143: tṛtīye sarvai sarvasmai sarvadā ca prayacchati |
XXvabhdicu:3146: yadā punaḥ prāṇaparityāgenāpi prāṇātipātādiśikṣāpadaṃ na kṣobhayati, iyatā śīlapāramitā paripūrṇā veditavyā |
XXvabhdicu:3149: bhagavantaṃ khalu tiṣyaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ ekayā gāthayā ekapādena sthitvā saptāhamabhiṣṭhuvataḥ śākyamunervīyapāramitā paripūrṇā nava ca kalpāḥ pratyudāvartitāḥ |
XXvabhdicu:3155: atra punaḥ kecid buddhavacane bahiṣkṛtabuddhayaḥ prāhuḥ- "na hi piṭakatraye bhagavatā bodhisattvamārga upadiṣṭaḥ |" ta evaṃ vyāhartavyāḥ |
XXvabhdicu:3166: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā- "yadbhikṣavaḥ sūtrenāvatarati, vinayena dṛśyate,
XXvabhdicu:3167: dharmatāṃ ca vilomayati nedaṃ śāstuḥ śāsanam" iti kṛṣṇāpadeśaḥ |
XXvabhdicu:3169: yatkhalu sūtraṃ bhagavatā buddhena bhāṣitaṃ taccaturṣvāgameṣu sthaviramahākāśyapasthavirānandādibhiḥ saṃgītikartṛbhirūddānagāthābhirnibaddhaṃ tadeva grāhyam |
XXvabhdicu:3174: kalpānāṃ yadi saṃkhyā na vidyate kathaṃ tarhi trayamiti nirdhāryate ? na khalu saṃkhyā na vidyate |
XXvabhdicu:3178: na tu na saṃkhyā vidyata ityetadvivakṣitam |
XXvabhdicu:3179: atha yaṃ śākyamunirbhagavānsamyaksaṃbuddho bodhisattvacaryāyāmeṣu triṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu kiyatāṃ buddhānāṃ paryupāsāṃ cakre ? tadatra varṇayanti |
XXvabhdicu:3183: kasya punaḥ kalpāsaṃkhyeyasyāvasāne katamo buddho babhūva ? atrāpi varṇayanti |
XXvabhdicu:3189: śākyamunirnāma prathamasyāsaṃkhyeyasyādau babhūva yatra bhagavatā bhārgavabhūtena sukhodakenāṅgaparicaryābhirupasthānaṃ kṛtvā prathamaṃ bodhicittamutpāditamahamapyevaṃ prakāro bhūyāsamiti |
XXvabhdicu:3191: kasminpunaḥ kāle buddhā bhagavanto buddhādityāḥ prādurbhavanti ?
XXvabhdicu:3202: caturvidhāḥ khalu cakravartinaḥ- sauvarṇacakrāḥ, rūpyacakrāḥ, tāmracakrāḥ,
XXvabhdicu:3206: yadi tarhi mārgabhedo nāsti buddhapratyekabuddhaśrāvakānāṃ phalabhedenāpi tarhi na bhavitavyam
XXvabhdicu:3211: yāvatkhalu kaścidguṇaḥ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya bhagavatā deśito vinirmuktidvayaprāptihetubhūtaḥ sarvo 'sau piṭakatrayānuvartī |
XXvabhdicu:3215: tadyathā dvayormātrostulyaṃ vastu tulye kṣetre pratipādayatoścetanāviśeṣādatulyaṃ
XXvabhdicu:3220: tatra bhagavato buddhasya karuṇābhāvanā codrekena vartate bhagavānbuddhaḥ
XXvabhdicu:3223: kiñca, parato ghoṣamantareṇāpi carame janmani suyoniśomanaskārabalena hetupratyayaphalāvabodhopalambhāt,
XXvabhdicu:3225: atha tulyāyāṃ vimuktau sthitānāṃ trayāṇāmabhisametṛṇāṃ ko viśeṣaḥ ?
XXvabhdicu:3229: tatra hetukṛtaṃ tāvadbhagavato buddhasya mahattvaṃ triṣu kalpāsaṃkhyeyeṣu sūtravinayābhidharmālokena vineyajanamanograheṣvajñānatimirotsādanāt |
XXvabhdicu:3239: tatra pañcāśaccetanāḥ prayogabhūtāḥ pañcāśatpṛṣṭhabhūtāḥ, ekayā tallakṣaṇamākṣipati ||
XXvabhdicu:3242: pratikarmapathaṃ pañca, maulakarmapathapariśuddhiḥ sāmantakasyavitarkānupaghātaḥ smṛtyanuparigrahaḥ, nirvāṇapariṇāmanaṃ ca |
XXvabhdicu:3253: evantu varṇayanti- sannikṛṣṭaṃ bodhisattvaṃ sthāpayitvā yatsarvasattvānāṃ bhogaiśvaryādhipatyaphalamiyadekasya puṇyasya pramāṇam ||
XXvabhdicu:3255: tatra kaḥ samāsaḥ kiṃ sādhano vā
XXvabhdicu:3256: dānaśabdaḥ, ko vā svabhāvo dānasya iti ? tadapadiśyate |
XXvabhdicu:3259: yatpunarucyate- 'kiṃ sādhano vāyaṃ dānaśabdaḥ, ko vā dānasya svabhāvaḥ';
XXvabhdicu:3261: dānaṃ hi dīyate yena svaparārthādyapekṣayā // Abhidh-d_243 //
XXvabhdicu:3266: astu tarhi karmasādhano dīyate taditi dānam |
XXvabhdicu:3282: prādhānyānmuninā proktaṃ mahābhogaphalaṃ hi tat // Abhidh-d_244 //
XXvabhdicu:3290: tatra svahitāyaiva yathā pṛthagjanaḥ parinirvate bhagavati caityāya dadāti parārthameva yathā arhan saṃghāya dadāti, na ceṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ bhavati
XXvabhdicu:3292: nobhayārthaṃ yadarhaṃścaityāya dadāti tacca na dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ bhavati kevalaṃ tu satpuruṣapraśastamārgāvasthānapradarśanārtham
XXvabhdicu:3295: tatra kathaṃ dātṛviśeṣaḥ kathaṃ vastuviśeṣaḥ kathaṃ kṣetraviśeṣaḥ ?
XXvabhdicu:3297: yadā dātā hetuphalasaṃbandhaniścaye śraddadhāno dadāti śīlavān kalyāṇadharmā buddhavacanabahuśrutaśca bhavati nirmatsarī muktahastaśca bhavati nirvāṇānuśaṃsaḥ satkṛtya svahastaṃ kālena parānanupahatya dadāti,
XXvabhdicu:3306: yadi vastu varṇagandharasasparśasampannaṃ bhavati tadā viśiṣyate |
XXvabhdicu:3307: tataḥ surupitvaṃ yaśasvitā priyatā sukumāratvaṃ sukhasparśāṅgatā bhavati yathākramam |
XXvabhdicu:3312: yathoktam- "tiryagyonigatāya dānaṃ datvā śataguṇo vipākaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ syāt |
XXvabhdicu:3313: duḥśīlāya manuṣyabhūtāya datvā sahasraguṇaḥ |" duḥkhaviśeṣātkṣetraṃ viśiṣyate |
XXvabhdicu:3318: yathā mātāpitroranyeṣāṃ copakāriṇāṃ ye aṭavīdurgakāntāre bhūtavyasanebhyo nistārayanti |
XXvabhdicu:3320: atha kathaṃ cetanāyāḥ viśeṣo bhavati ? brūmaḥ-
XXvabhdicu:3324: tatrāśayābhiprāyaḥ yathā- evaṃ caivaṃ ca kuryāṃ kariṣyāmīti vā cetanāyā karmapathaṃ samākṣipati
XXvabhdicu:3334: atha kasya kasmai datvā dānamagryaphalaṃ bhavati ? tadabhidhīyate-
XXvabhdicu:3337: yatkhalu bodhisattvaḥ sarvasattvahitādhyāśayeṇa dānaṃ dadāti tadagryamuttamārthaphalatvāt bhagavatāṣṭau khalu dānānyuktāni sūtre "āsādya dānam |
XXvabhdicu:3346: sūtra uktam- "sāṃcetanikasyāhaṃ karmaṇaḥ kṛtopacitasya nāpratisaṃvedyaphala vadāmi" iti
XXvabhdicu:3351: tatra saṃpradhāryākṣiptaṃ nābuddhipūrvaṃ yadṛcchayā yacca kṛtvā paripūrikābhiścetanābhiḥ paripūritaṃ bhavati |
XXvabhdicu:3358: tadyathā maitrīvihāriṇo maharṣayo na ca lokaṃ sukhena yojayantyatha cāparimitaṃ puṇyaṃ pratigṛhṇantyevaṃ caityādiṣu tadguṇādhimuktivaśena svacittaprasādādeva puṇyaprasūtimicchanti ||
XXvabhdicu:3376: etadapi śīlamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu mahābhogatāphalaṃ mokṣaphalaṃ ca, praṇidhipariṇāmanaviśeṣāt
XXvabhdicu:3381: yatkhalu śīlaṃ dauḥśīlyena na vidūṣitaṃ prāṇātipātādināṣṭaprakāreṇa,
XXvabhdicu:3396: yathā tailaṃ puṣpaiścampakādibhirvāsitaṃ tanmayi bhavati tatsamādhisaṃprayuktaistatsahabhūkaiśca dharmaiścittaṃ bhāvitaṃ vāsitamityucyate, tanmayīkaraṇāt |
XXvabhdicu:3398: samāhitameva cittaṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu maitryādiguṇasaṃprayuktaṃ draṣṭavyam |
XXvabhdicu:3399: kathaṃ punaretatpuṇyakriyāvastu mantavyam ? kiṃ puṇyaṃ kriyā ca vastu ca
XXvabhdicu:3403: kathaṃ ca na doṣaḥ ? tatra tāvat |
XXvabhdicu:3407: yā tatsamutthāpikā cetanā sā puṇyaṃ ca kriyā ca, tatsahabhuvo dharmāḥ puṇyameva |
XXvabhdicu:3409: bhāvanāmayaṃ maitro puṇyaṃ ca puṇyakriyāśca vastu |
XXvabhdicu:3410: tatsaṃprayuktāyāścetanāyā maitryadhiṣṭhānenābhisaṃskārāṇāṃ maitrīsahabhūcetanā śīlaṃ ca puṇyakriyā ca |
XXvabhdicu:3412: tatpunaretadbhāvanāmayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu sarvaṃ tatsarvahetutve 'pi sati pradhānyādapavargāya taduktaṃ sarvadarśinā // Abhidh-d_256 //
XXvabhdicu:3413: uttamārthaprāptaye khalvāsannatamo heturbhāvaneti kṛtvā bhagavatā bhāvanāmayameva kuśalamūlaṃ visaṃyogāya vidhiyuktamuktam |
XXvabhdicu:3418: puṇyabhāgīyaṃ yena devamanuṣyopapattibījaṃ pratigṛhṇāti maheśākhyaiśca kulamahābhogarūpyacakravartiśakrapuṣpaketubrahmatvādīnāṃ prāptaye phalamākṣipati |
XXvabhdicu:3421: atha yadidaṃ loka ucyate lipimudrāgaṇanāsaṃkhyeti eṣāṃ kaḥ svabhāvaḥ ?
XXvabhdicu:3425: tatra tāvallipimudre yogapravartitaṃ kāyakarmasamutthānamiti pañcaskandhātmikā lipiḥ |
XXvabhdicu:3426: yena tu karmaṇākṣarāṇi nirvartyante tatkarma lipirityucyate |
XXvabhdicu:3431: yanmanasā saṃkalitaṃ dharmāṇāṃ sā tu saparivārā catuskandhasvabhāveti ||
XXvabhdicu:3435: atha yadayaṃ lokaḥ pañcagati cakrāvartaparivartanimittāni karmāṇyācinoti, kāryāṇi cotsṛjyākāryakarmakārī bhavati, dakṣiṇaṃ ca mārgaṃ
XXvabhdicu:3436: hitvā vāmaṃ vartmāśrayati, paramapraśāntaṃ ca paraṃ
XXvabhdicu:3437: brahmāpāsyānekaduḥkhopadravanīḍabhūte saṃsāre janma pratipadyate tatra ko
XXvabhdicu:3441: te punaḥ kleśāḥ svaśaktijakriyodbhūtairviśeṣaiste tu nāmabhiḥ /
XXvabhdicu:3443: tatra tāvatsāmānyasaṃjñā svakriyānirjātāḥ kliśnantīti kleśāḥ anuśerata
XXvabhdicu:3445: ābhavāgramupādāya yāvadavīciṃ stravanti srāvayanti ca cittasantatimityāsravāḥ |
XXvabhdicu:3454: ete khalu ṣaḍanuśayāḥ saṃsārapravṛttihetavaḥ śreyomārgavivandhinaśca śāstra uktāḥ |
XXvabhdicu:3461: atha rāgādayo 'nuśayāḥ kathaṃ draṣṭavyāḥ ? kiṃ rāgādaya evānuśayāḥ,
XXvabhdicu:3464: (Jaini_221) "ihaikatyo na kāmarāgaparyavasthitena cetasā bahulaṃ viharatyutpannasya kāmarāgaparyavasthānasyottaranissaraṇaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
XXvabhdicu:3465: tasya tatkāmarāgaparyavasthānaṃ sthāmaśaḥ samyaksusaṃvahataṃ sānuśayaṃ prahīyate" iti |
XXvabhdicu:3468: karmadhāraya eva parigṛhyate na ṣaṣṭhīsamāsa iti vaibhāṣikāḥ |
XXvabhdicu:3475: "evaṃ tu sādhu yathā dārṣṭāntikānām" iti kośakāraḥ |
XXvabhdicu:3477: na cānuśayaḥ saṃprayukto na viprayuktaḥ; tasyādravyāntaratvāt |
XXvabhdicu:3484: ko 'yaṃ vījabhāvo nāma ? ātmabhāvasya kleśajā kleśotpādakaśaktiḥ, yathā cāṅkurādīnāṃ śāliphalajā (Jaini_223) śāliphalotpādanaśaktiḥ" iti |
XXvabhdicu:3485: yattarhi sūtra eva kleśo 'nuśaya uktaḥ ṣaṭṣaṭke- "so 'sya bhavati sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ rāgānuśayaḥ" iti ? bhavatīti vacanādadoṣaḥ |
XXvabhdicu:3497: nānyānanya iti bījavāsanāvasthāne cittavināśābhyupagame ca madhyamāpratipatsiddhiriti cet
XXvabhdicu:3500: te punaḥ rāgadvedhāt matāḥ sapta dṛṣṭibhedāddaśa smṛtāḥ /
XXvabhdicu:3518: tatra katyeṣāmaṣṭānavateranuśayāṇāṃ duḥkhadarśanaheyāḥ kati yāvadbhāvanāheyāḥ ? tatra kāmadhātau tāvat |
XXvabhdicu:3519: pratiduḥkhādisatyaṃ yathākramaṃ daśa sapta saptāṣṭau duḥkhādidarśanaheyā dvātriṃśatkāmadhātau bhavanti |
XXvabhdicu:3534: kati punarebhyaḥ kāmadhātau darśanaheyāḥ kati yāvadbhāvanāheyāḥ ?
XXvabhdicu:3536: daśeha duḥkhadṛggheyāḥ sarve 'pi daśeha kāmadhātau duḥkhe vipratipannatvādduḥkhadarśanaheyāḥ
XXvabhdicu:3539: saptāpavargadṛggheyāḥ eta eva aṣṭau mārgekṣaṇakṣayāḥ // Abhidh-d_265 //
XXvabhdicu:3544: te darśanaprahātavyāsteṣāṃ caturṇāṃ rāgādīnāṃ yasmādālambanamatastatprahāṇātteṣāmapi (Jaini_228) prahāṇaṃ stambhanipātādupastambhanipātanavat |
XXvabhdicu:3545: ye tu rāgādayaścatvāraḥ svalakṣaṇakleśāste bhāvanāprahātavyā draṣṭavyā rāgapratighamānāvidyāḥ
XXvabhdicu:3547: avidyamāne khalu vastunyete skandheṣu viparītasaṃdehākāragrahaṇaṃ kṛtvā pravartete |
XXvabhdicu:3563: atha ya ete 'ṣṭāśītiranuśayā darśanaprahātavyāḥ kimete darśanamārgeṇaiva
XXvabhdicu:3566: bhavāgre kṣāntiheyā ye dṛggheyā eva te matāḥ /
XXvabhdicu:3569: evamanyāsvapi bhūmiṣu ye 'nuśayā jñānavadhyāsta āryāṇāṃ pṛthagjanānāṃ ca bhāvanāmārgeṇaiva prahīyante |
XXvabhdicu:3571: yathāyogaṃ śeṣāsu khalu bhūmiṣu yathāsaṃbhavaṃ dharmānvayakṣāntibadhyā anuśayā āryāṇāṃ darśanaheyāḥ, pṛthagjanānāṃ ca bhāvanāheyā iti boddhavyam ||
XXvabhdicu:3572: atha yā imāḥ pañca dṛṣṭayo dhātvākāraprakārabhedena ṣaṭtriṃśaddhā bhinnāstāsāṃ pratyekaṃ kaḥ svabhāvaḥ ? tadārabhyate -
XXvabhdicu:3573: ahaṃ mameti yā dṛṣṭirasau satkāyadṛk smṛtā /
XXvabhdicu:3575: hetubalasāmarthyādasacchāstraśravaṇācca pṛthagjanasyāhaṃ mamemi pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu ya ātmagrāhaḥ sā satkāyadṛṣṭirityucyate |
XXvabhdicu:3576: sati sīdati vā kāye dṛṣṭirviparītākārā satkāyadṛṣṭiriti nirvacanam |
XXvabhdicu:3585: anena śāstraproktayā mithyādṛṣṭeḥ sākalyena grahaṇaṃ pratyetavyam |
XXvabhdicu:3591: catasro dṛṣṭīḥ pratyavaraṃ ca vastvagrato gṛhṇāti kathamagryeyaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ ?
XXvabhdicu:3592: yeyamātmadṛṣṭiḥ- ātmānamahaṃ pūjayiṣyāmi vāsudevo 'tra pūjito bhaviṣyatīti hīnapuruṣaṃpañcopādānaskandhātmakamagrataḥ pratipadyate |
XXvabhdicu:3595: tadyathā prakṛtīśvarapuruṣādihetukaṃ pañcopādānaskandhātmakaṃ na tṛṣṇāhetukamityakāraṇe kāraṇadarśanam
XXvabhdicu:3600: vratam- āgneyamagniparicaraṇaṃ śaukramāpo hi ṣṭhādyanuṣṭhānam apāṃ śukradaivatyatvāt |
XXvabhdicu:3602: athavā govratādīni vratānyebhiḥ śudhyate mucyata ityāhuḥ |
XXvabhdicu:3603: trayīdharmāṇasta eva te hariharahiraṇyagarbhādayo na kāraṇamupādānaskandhātmakatvāt |
XXvabhdicu:3604: na ca nityāḥ, na cāgryā ityetadvistareṇāviṣkṛtam |
XXvabhdicu:3617: yadā khalvasya dharmeṣu dharmamātrabuddhirutpannā bhavatyanityāḥ, duḥkhāḥ,
XXvabhdicu:3618: śūnyāḥ, anātmānaśca dharmā iti tadaiva satkāyadṛṣṭyavacchedo bhavati,
XXvabhdicu:3619: tatpravartitā cāntargrāhadṛṣṭiḥ, tatropāttasyā api samudghāta iti |
XXvabhdicu:3620: tatra dharmadarśanamanityādyanyatamākāraṃ yasmādduḥkhābhisamayamātrādbhavatyata etad dṛṣṭidvayaṃ dukhadarśanaheyameveti siddham ||
XXvabhdicu:3621: atha ya ete catvāro viparyāsāḥ- "anitye nityam" evamādayaste kiṃ svabhāvāḥ
XXvabhdicu:3631: puruṣameva tu svatantraṃ kartāraṃ vaśinamātmavādī manyamāno mamedamityabhyupagacchati tasmādātmadṛṣṭirevāsau
XXvabhdicu:3632: yadi ca mametyetad dṛṣṭyantaraṃ syānmayā mahyamityevamādyapi dṛṣṭyantaraṃ syāt |
XXvabhdicu:3634: nanu ca sarve kleśā viparyāsāḥ viparītapravṛtatvāt ? tatkimucyate catvāra iti ? naiṣa doṣaḥ
XXvabhdicu:3640: ekāntaviparyaste ca, na tu samāropike dravyanāśapravṛttatvāt |
XXvabhdicu:3644: nanu ca sūtra uktam- "ānitye nityamiti saṃjñāviparyāsaḥ, cittaviparyāso dṛṣṭiviparyāsa evaṃ yāvadātmani" iti dvādaśa bhavanti |
XXvabhdicu:3651: loke 'pi viparyastasaṃjño viparyastacittaścocyate na viparyastavedano viparyastacetana iti
XXvabhdicu:3652: atha kiṃ dṛṣṭyanuśayavat mānānuśayasyāpi kaścidbhedo 'sti ? vidyata ityāha |
XXvabhdicu:3665: asti me śreyānasti me sadṛśo 'sti me
XXvabhdicu:3666: hīnaḥ, nāsti me śreyo nāsti me sadṛśo nāsti me hīnaḥ" iti |
XXvabhdicu:3678: iti evametā navamānavidhāstribhyo mānebhyo vyavasthāpyante mānāmimānonamānebhyaḥ |
XXvabhdicu:3679: ta ete saptamānāḥ sarve 'pi darśanabhāvanāheyāḥ sthavirakṣemakasūtrokteḥ-
XXvabhdicu:3681: kiṃ punaryadbhāvanāheyamaprahīṇaṃ sarvaṃ tadāryasya samudācarati ? netyāha
XXvabhdicu:3683: tadyathā śraddhādīni pañcendriyāṇi middhaṃ duḥkhendriyaṃ cakṣurādyaṣṭakaṃ ceti |
XXvabhdicu:3686: vibhavecchā ca nāryasya jāyante hetvabhāvataḥ // Abhidh-d_276 //
XXvabhdicu:3687: yena khalu kleśaparyavasthānena saṃcitya prāṇivadhādattādānakāmamithyācāramṛṣāvādānadhyāpadyetaitadvadhādyaprahīṇamapi na samudācarati bhāvanāheyatvāt |
XXvabhdicu:3692: aho vatāhamairāvaṇaḥ syāṃ nāgarājā aho vatāhamasurendraḥ syāṃ vaimacitrādiḥ |
XXvabhdicu:3694: kiṃ punaratra kāraṇaṃ yadete 'prahīṇāḥ khalvapi santo nāryasya
XXvabhdicu:3701: kaukṛtyamapi cākuśalamavītarāgasyāryasyāprahīṇaṃ na cāsya tatsaṃbhavati cikitsāsamutthitatvāditi
XXvabhdicu:3706: dvayoḥ khalu nikāyayoḥ duḥkhasamudayākhyayostaddarśanaheyāṇāṃ vakṣyamāṇānāṃ kleśānāmubhayatra labdhapratiṣṭhatvāt ||
XXvabhdicu:3707: kiṃ punaḥ sarve duḥkhasamudayaheyāḥ na heyāḥ sarvatragāḥ ? netyāha |
XXvabhdicu:3711: saptadṛṣṭayo dve vicikitse tābhiśca saṃyuktāvidyā āveṇikī ca (Jaini_240)
XXvabhdicu:3712: dviprakārā ityekādaśānuśayā dhātau dhātau svadhātubhūmisarvatragā jñeyāḥ |
XXvabhdicu:3715: ete punaḥ sarvatragāḥ dravyato daśa caikaśca nāmnā sapta tu te matāḥ /
XXvabhdicu:3727: teṣāṃ sahabhuvo dharmāḥ prāptivarjyāśca sarvagāḥ // Abhidh-d_281 //
XXvabhdicu:3728: ye sarvatragānuśayasahabhuvo vedanādayo dharmāḥ, jātyādayaśca te 'pi
XXvabhdicu:3730: teṣāṃ punaraṣṭānavatīnāmanuśayānāṃ kati sāsravālambanāḥ katyanāsravālambanāḥ ? tadārabhyate-
XXvabhdicu:3736: athaite nirmalālambanāḥ kati katyuparamamālambyante, kati bhūmipratipakṣaṃ ca ? taducyate-
XXvabhdicu:3742: mārgālambanānāṃ tu kāmāvacarāṇāṃ sarva eva svabhūmikāḥ kleśāḥ mārga ālambanam |
XXvabhdicu:3746: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ mithyādṛṣṭyā nirodhaḥ paricchinna ālambyate, na mārgeṇa ? taducyate |
XXvabhdicu:3747: 'hetutvāddhetubhāvataśca |'; mārgo hi parasparahetukaḥ, na tu nirodha
XXvabhdicu:3749: atha kasmādrāgapratighamānā dṛṣṭiśīlavrataparāmarśo ca nānāsravālambanā iṣyante ? tatrāpadiṣyate-
XXvabhdicu:3752: tatra rāgastāvadyadyanāsravālambanaḥ syānnirvāṇābhilāṣapravṛttatvātkuśaladharmacchandavat, na yogināṃ varjanīyaḥ syāt |
XXvabhdicu:3756: parāmarśī ca yadyanāsravālambanau syātāṃ samyagdṛṣṭitvaṃ pratipadyeyātām |
XXvabhdicu:3767: tatra te ye 'nuśayāḥ svadhātubhūmisarvatragāste sakalāmeva pañcaprakārāṃ svadhātubhūmimālambanato 'nuśerate |
XXvabhdicu:3769: | duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyāḥ duḥkhadarśana prahātavyameva nikāyaṃ yāvadbhāvanāprahātavyā bhāvanāprahātavyameveti
XXvabhdicu:3774: anāsrave tu vastunyūrdhvabhūmike ca pravṛttireva satkāyadṛṣṭitṛṣṇayornāstīti na tatrānuśerate
XXvabhdicu:3777: yo yena dharmeṇānuśayaḥ saṃprayuktaḥ sa tasminsaṃprayogiṇi saṃprayogato 'nuśerate yāvadaprahīṇo bhavatīti 'tu';
XXvabhdicu:3779: tataścedamapi siddhaṃ bhavati- anāsravālambanā visabhāgadhātubhūmyālambanāśca saṃprayogata evānuśerate |
XXvabhdicu:3792: niruktanyāyena pūrvaṃ vā prāptimutsṛjya paścātsamudācārato 'nuśerata ityanuśayāḥ |
XXvabhdicu:3794: abhidharmadīpe vibhāṣāprabhāyāṃ vṛttau pañcamasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ
XXvabhdicu:3798: dhātudvaye tu sarve 'pi nivṛtāvyākṛtā malāḥ // Abhidh-d_289 //
XXvabhdicu:3807: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā- "yeyaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ sarvaṃ me na kṣamata itīyaṃ
XXvabhdicu:3809: tathoktam- idamagryaṃ bāhyakānāṃ dṛṣṭikṛtānāṃ yaduta no ca syānna ca me syānna bhaviṣyāmi na me bhaviṣyati"
XXvabhdicu:3815: ebhyaḥ punaḥ katyakuśalamūlāni kati neti ? taducyate-
XXvabhdicu:3818: ye dharmā akuśalāścākuśalamūlaṃ ca darśanabhāvanāheyāśca pañcaprakārāśca ṣaḍvijñānakāyikāśca ta evākuśalamūlānīṣyante ||
XXvabhdicu:3819: kiṃ punaryathākuśalāni anuśayānāṃ mūlāni santyevamavyākṛtānāmapi santīti ?
XXvabhdicu:3821: avidyā dhīśca tṛṣṇā ca na kāṅkṣāmānadṛṣṭayaḥ // Abhidh-d_291 //
XXvabhdicu:3822: "trīṇi khalvavyākṛtamūlāni, avyākṛtāvidyā tṛṣṇā prajñā" iti kāśmīrāḥ |
XXvabhdicu:3824: anivṛtāvyākṛtā ca prajñā hetutvena vartata ityasāvapyavyākṛtamūlam |
XXvabhdicu:3843: atha yāni sūtre caturdaśāvyākṛtavastūnyuktāni, kiṃ tāni kuśalākuśalapakṣāvyākaraṇādavyākṛtavastūni ? netyāha |
XXvabhdicu:3847: śiṣyāṇāṃ vādaśikṣārthaṃ sthitīnāṃ ca catuṣṭayīm // Abhidh-d_293 //
XXvabhdicu:3848: trīṇi khalu kathāvastūnyārabhya catvāri vyākaraṇānyāvabudhya catasraśca sthitīravagamya vigṛhya sabhāyāṃ pañcabhiravayavaiḥ svapakṣaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya vādaḥ karaṇīyo nāto 'nyathā ityatra viniścayāt kāni punastāni catvāri vyākaraṇāni ? kāśca tāścatasraḥ sthitayaḥ ?
XXvabhdicu:3852: tatraikāṃśavyākaraṇam- kiṃ yaḥ kaścijjāyate sarvosau mriyate? omiti vācyam |
XXvabhdicu:3853: atha yaḥ kaścinmriyate sarvosau jāyata iti ? vibhajya vyākartavyam-
XXvabhdicu:3855: kiṃ manuṣyo viśiṣṭo 'tha hīna iti ? paripṛcchya vyākartavyam- kānadhikṛtya pṛcchasi ? devāṃstiryagādīnvā
XXvabhdicu:3858: kimanyaḥ skandhebhyaḥ puruṣo vānanya iti ? eṣa praśnaḥ sthāpanīyaḥ, sadasatoranyānanyatvavyākaraṇāyogāt,
XXvabhdicu:3863: kaściddhi vādī sthānāsthāne saṃbhavāsaṃbhavākhye saṃtiṣṭhate kaścinna saṃtiṣṭhate |
XXvabhdicu:3866: saṃtiṣṭhate, yaḥ parikalpite dṛṣṭānte dārṣṭāntikārthe prasādhake saṃtiṣṭhate, sa ca kathyo yo na santiṣṭhate so 'kathyaḥ |
XXvabhdicu:3867: evaṃ pratipadi jñānavāditāyāṃ yaḥ santiṣṭhate sa kathyate |
XXvabhdicu:3870: atha kenānuśayena kasminvastuni saṃyuktaḥ ? tatra tāvadvastu kṣetravastvādipañcaprakāram |
XXvabhdicu:3882: prakāranaiyamyena tu duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyaiḥ sarvatragaiḥ pañcasu nikāyeṣvālambanataḥ saṃyuktaḥ
XXvabhdicu:3887: athedānīmatītānāgatapratyutpannanaiyamyena kaḥ pudgalaḥ kasminvastuni katamenānuśayena saṃyuktaḥ ? tadidamudbhāvyate-
XXvabhdicu:3893: pratyutpannāśca yasminvastunyutpannā na ca prahīṇāstasminvastuni taiḥ saṃprayukto veditavyaḥ
XXvabhdicu:3899: ato ye mānarāgadayo nāgatā na prahīṇāstaiḥ sarvasmiṃstraiyadhvike vastuni saṃyuktaḥ |
XXvabhdicu:3902: 'nyai rāgādibhiranāgatairanāgata eva vastuni saṃyukto 'tītairatīta eva pratyutpannaiḥ pratyutpanna eva |
XXvabhdicu:3905: vastunyaprahīṇaiḥ saṃyuktaḥ syānna ca kevalaṃ mānasairevānāgatairebhiḥ sarvatra |
XXvabhdicu:3911: kathaṃ punargamyate 'tītādiṣu vastuṣu rāgādaya utpadyante taiśca tatra saṃyukto bhavatīti ? sūtrādeva hi |
XXvabhdicu:3917: utpanne cchande saṃprayuktastairdharmairvaktavyo (Jaini_254) na visaṃyuktaḥ |" tathā- "yasmin rūpe 'tītānāgatapratyutpanne utpadyate
XXvabhdicu:3919: kaḥ punaratra saṃyujyate ? yadā śūnyāḥ sarvasaṃskārāḥ, nityena dhruveṇa śāśvatenāvipariṇāmadharmeṇātmanātmīyena vā ? yathoktam- "asti karmāsti vipākaḥ kārakastu nopalabhyate ya imāṃśca skandhān pratinikṣipyānyān skandhān pratisaṃdadhātītyanyatra dharmasaṃketāt" iti vistaraḥ |
XXvabhdicu:3920: tatra pratisamādhānam- 'saṃyuktā skandhasantatiḥ |'; skandhasantatau hi skandhalakṣaṇasantānaikatvābhimānāt, saṃṣṛtyā sattvasaṃjñaptirityadoṣaḥ ||
XXvabhdicu:3923: vastusaṃyo nākhyaṃ dvayaṃ paramārthato vidyate sattvākhyastu tṛtīyo 'rthaḥ
XXvabhdicu:3925: kutaḥ punaretad dvayaṃ paramārthato vidyate ? taducyate-
XXvabhdicu:3930: taiḥ śubhaṃ ca śubhato 'śubhaṃ cāśubhataḥ, guṇāśca guṇataḥ doṣāśca doṣataḥ parigṛhītaḥ
XXvabhdicu:3932: iti siddhaṃ dvayaṃ pariniṣpannaṃ tṛtīyaṃ tūpacārata iti |
XXvabhdicu:3934: yadidaṃ pratyuktaṃ vastuhetupratyayātpratītyotpannaṃ paramārthato vidyate pratyātmavedanīyatvāt, tadālambanāśca rāgādayaḥ dravyataḥ santīti |
XXvabhdicu:3935: yatpunaridamuktamatītānāgate vastuni traiyadhvikairanuśayaiḥ saṃyukta iti tadetatsāhasamāhopuruṣikamātram
XXvabhdicu:3945: atra punaḥ ebhyo yaḥ prathamo vādī bhajate sādhutāmasau /
XXvabhdicu:3947: yaḥ khalveṣa prathamo vādī sarvāstivādākhyaḥ, eṣa khalu yuktyāgamopapannābhidhāyitvātsadvādī
XXvabhdicu:3952: kaḥ punarayaṃ sarvāstivādī sādhutāṃ bhajate ? tadidamavadyotyate |
XXvabhdicu:3953: eṣa khalu vādī icchatyadhvatrayaṃ yasmāt kṛtyataśca dhruvatrayam /
XXvabhdicu:3962: yathā suvarṇasya kaṭakādisaṃsthānāntareṇa kriyamāṇasya pūrvasaṃsthānanāśe suvarṇanāśaḥ |
XXvabhdicu:3963: kṣīrasya vā dadhitvena pariṇamato yathā rasavīryavipākaparityāgo na varṇasyeti |
XXvabhdicu:3979: nikṣepavartikaikāṅkavinyastaiketyucyate, saiva śatāṅke śataṃ sahasrāṅke sahasramiti |
XXvabhdicu:3985: athaikā strī pūrvāparamapekṣya mātā cocyate duhitā ca |
XXvabhdicu:4001: ye khalu bhagavatoktāḥ svabhāvasiddhāstraiyādhvikā dharmā atītānāgatapratyutpannāsteṣāmayamācāryaḥ kriyādvāreṇāvasthābhedamicchatyajahatsvarūpo hetusāmagrīsannidhānaprabodhitaśaktiḥ |
XXvabhdicu:4006: atrāha codakaḥ- na, atītānāgatasyārthasya prajñaptyā vyapadeśasiddheḥ |
XXvabhdicu:4015: yasya khalvarthavastunaḥ svabhāvasiddhasvarūpasyāviparītākārayā dharmopalakṣaṇayā paricchinnaṃ lakṣaṇamupalakṣyate tatsaddravyamityucyate
XXvabhdicu:4017: paramārthena yannityaṃ svabhāvena saṃgṛhītaṃ na kadācitsvamātmānaṃ jahāti,
XXvabhdicu:4024: atha yadidamuktaṃ dravyasanto 'tītānāgatādhvasthā dharmā iti tadāgamayuktyanabhidhānādabhidhānamātram
XXvabhdicu:4029: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā- "asti bhikṣavo 'tītaṃ rūpaṃ nocedatītaṃ rūpaṃ
XXvabhdicu:4031: yasmāttarhyastyatītaṃ rūpaṃ tasmādime sattvā atīte rūpe saṃrañjyante |" evamanāgatapratyutpannaṃ ceti vācyam |
XXvabhdicu:4036: kriyāvacanena cottarapadena pūrvasya kriyāvacanasyaiva padasya sāmānādhikaraṇyāt |
XXvabhdicu:4037: punaścoktaṃ bhagavatā- "rūpamanityamatītānāgatam, kaḥ punarvādaḥ pratyutpannasya ? evaṃdarśī śrutavānāryaśrāvako 'tīte rūpe 'napekṣo
XXvabhdicu:4039: pratyutpannasya rūpasya nirvide virāgāya nirodhāya pratipanno bhavati |
XXvabhdicu:4040: atītaṃ cedrūpaṃ nābhaviṣyanna śrutavānāryaśrāvako 'tīte rūpe 'napekṣo 'bhaviṣyat; yasmāttarhyastyatītaṃ rūpaṃ tasmācchrutavānāryaśrāvakaḥ atīte rūpe 'napekṣo bhavati" iti vistaraḥ |
XXvabhdicu:4041: tathoktam- yacchāriputra karmābhyatītaṃ kṣīṇaṃniruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇataṃ tadastīti |
XXvabhdicu:4042: taccet karma śāriputra nābhaviṣyannehaikatīyastaddhetoḥ tatpratyayādapāya durgativinipātaṃ kāyasya bhedānnarakeṣūpapatsyate" iti vistaraḥ |
XXvabhdicu:4053: tatraitat syāt- paramārthaśūnyatā sūtre bhagavatā (Jaini_267) vispaṣṭamanāgatādināstitvaṃ pradarśitam |
XXvabhdicu:4055: hyaktam- "cakṣurūtpadyamānaṃ na kutaścidāgacchati, nirudhyamānaṃ na kvacitsaṃnicayaṃ gacchati" iti vistaraḥ |
XXvabhdicu:4062: kutaścidāgacchati, nirudhyamānaṃ na kvacitsaṃnicayaṃ gacchati" iti tadvedoktavādavidhipratiṣedhārthaṃ sāṃkhyamatavyudāsārthaṃ ca |
XXvabhdicu:4070: sāṃkhyāḥ khalvapyācakṣate- "cakṣuṣpradhānādāgacchati tatraiva ca punarvigacchati" iti |
XXvabhdicu:4072: "cakṣarutpadyamānaṃ na kutaścidāgacchati |" adeśapradeśasthāḥ khalvanāgatātītaparamāṇvavijñaptisaṃjñitā dharmāḥ iti tadāgamanagamanānupapattiḥ |
XXvabhdicu:4081: sāṃkhyānāṃ khalvekaṃ kāraṇaṃ nityaṃ svāṃ jātimajahattena tena vikāraviśeṣātmanā bhūtvā bhūtvānyenānyena kāryaviśeṣātmanā pariṇamatīti |
XXvabhdicu:4083: "cakṣurutpadyamānaṃ na kutaścidāgacchati nirudhyamānaṃ na kvacitsaṃnicayaṃ gacchati" iti
XXvabhdicu:4084: cakṣurabhūtvā vartamāne 'dhvani kṣaṇamātraṃ kriyārūpamādaya tyaktvā punaradarśanaṃ gacchati
XXvabhdicu:4086: yaduktamasminneva sūtre cakṣurutpadyamānaṃ na kutaścidāgacchati" ityatraitadādarśitam |
XXvabhdicu:4092: yuktito 'pi- 'dhīnāmagocaratvācca tatsattvaṃ vartamānavat |'; tadākārayā khalu buddhyā yasyārthasya svasāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ paricchidyate, yaśca buddhoktanāmakāyadharmakāyābhyāmabhidyotyate sa paramārthato vidyate |
XXvabhdicu:4098: āgamastāvat- "cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpaṃ cotpadyate cakṣurvijñānaṃ yāvanmanaḥ pratītya dharmāṃścotpadyate manovijñānam |
XXvabhdicu:4102: na tu kvacidasadālambanamuktaṃ nāpi tadastīti tadviṣayabuddhyabhāvaḥ |
XXvabhdicu:4103: tathoktam- "yaduta loke nāsti tadahaṃ drakṣyāmi" iti vistaraḥ |
XXvabhdicu:4109: yaduta- kenacitprakāreṇa śūnyāḥ saṃskārāḥ mithyāparikalpitena puruṣālayavijñānābhūtaparikalpādinā
XXvabhdicu:4111: yathā kātyāyana sūtre- "lokasamudayaṃ jñātvā yā loke nāsti tā sā na bhavati |
XXvabhdicu:4112: lokanirodhaṃ jñātvā yā loke 'sti tā sā na bhavati itīmau dvāvantau parityajya madhyamayā pratipadā tathāgato dharmaṃ deśayati |" na caitad dva
XXvabhdicu:4121: yo 'yaṃ nāsti śaśaviṣāṇādipratiṣedho 'sya tarhi kiṃ pratiṣedhyam ?
XXvabhdicu:4125: kāryakāraṇādistrividhaḥ saṃbandho 'tra goviṣāṇādiṣu pūrvadṛṣṭaḥ śaśaviṣāṇādiṣu pratiṣiddhyate
XXvabhdicu:4129: saṃbandhyantarasaṃbandhabuddhyapekṣeṇāvadyotyate, na tu kiñcidabhidhānamabhidheyaṃ vā pratiṣedhyātmanā śrīyata iti siddhaṃ sarvā buddhiḥ sadviṣayeti |
XXvabhdicu:4131: gośiromātramākāśadhātuveṣṭitaṃ dṛṣṭvā janiṣyate dhvastaṃ vā goviṣāṇamiti draṣṭavyam |
XXvabhdicu:4135: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā hastatālopame sūtre- "etāvatsarvaṃ yaduta cakṣū rūpaṃ ca yāvanmano dharmāṃśca
XXvabhdicu:4136: yaḥ kaścidetad dvaya pratyākhyāyānyad dvayaṃ jñeyamabhidheyaṃ vā (Jaini_272) kalpayet vāgvastumātramevāsya syāt |
XXvabhdicu:4137: pṛṣṭo vā na saṃprajānīyāduttare vā saṃmohamāpadyeta |
XXvabhdicu:4144: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā- "ye kecidātmeti samanupaśyantaḥ samanupaśyanti sarve ta imāneva
XXvabhdicu:4149: yadi hi santamarthaṃ śaknuyātpratiṣeddhuṃ na rājāno hastyaśvaṃ bibhṛyurna santi dasyava ityevaṃ brūyuḥ |
XXvabhdicu:4154: tasmānnaño na goviṣāṇādiḥ nāpi śaśaviṣāṇādiḥ pratiṣidhyate |
XXvabhdicu:4165: yadetada rūpādidravyaṃ pūrvānubhūtaṃ tadeva tatsmṛtyā gṛhyata ityupariṣṭādapi sādhayiṣyāmaḥ
XXvabhdicu:4166: yā tarhi niruddhadevadattānusmṛtirdhaṭānusmṛtirvā sā kathaṃ jāyate ?
XXvabhdicu:4173: tadvattatsāmarthyeṇa bhāvinīṃ bhūtāṃ ca saṃjñāṃ rūpādiṣu devadattaghaṭalakṣaṇāṃ pratipadyata iti ||
XXvabhdicu:4176: atītānāgataṃ hi mitramamitraṃ vā manasi kṛtvā harṣotpādabhayādayo
XXvabhdicu:4180: | tadyathā sati vartamāne mitre 'mitre vā harṣabhayādayo bhavanti nāsatīti tadvat |
XXvabhdicu:4185: katham ? 'sadīpaghaṭarūpavat |'; tadyathā tamasi vidyamānasya ghaṭarūpasya svātmodbhāvanaśaktiḥ pradīpādikāraṇasāmagrīsannidhāne sati bhavati tadvaditi |
XXvabhdicu:4188: tadyathā asti vipariṇamate vardhate kṣīyate vinaśyatīti sati mukhyasattāviṣṭe kartari ete pañca bhāvavikārā bhavanti |
XXvabhdicu:4189: tadvajjāyata ityayamapi ṣaṣṭhaḥ bhāvavikāraḥ sati mukhyāviṣṭe kartari bhavitumarhatīti
XXvabhdicu:4190: kiñca jāyamānatā sattā naśyatā nāsāmānādhikaraṇye satyananyatāpattisaṅkaradoṣaprasaṅgāt |
XXvabhdicu:4201: tadyathā vikārye karmaṇi sati karaṇaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ kāśātkaṭī karoti |
XXvabhdicu:4202: prāpye ca karmaṇi sati grāmaṃ gacchati devadattaḥ sūryaṃ ca paśyatīti gamanadṛśikriye sati karmaṇi bhavataḥ |
XXvabhdicu:4203: tadvannirvartye 'pi karmaṇi mukhyadravyāstitve sati devadattakartṛkā ghaṭakriyopapadyata iti
XXvabhdicu:4209: yadi khalu kṣīre dadhyādayo vikārāḥ santi bīje cāṅkurādayaḥ śukraśoṇite ca
XXvabhdicu:4210: kalalādayaḥ, teṣāṃ jātānāṃ kṣīrādivajjanma punarna yujyate |
XXvabhdicu:4211: yathā ca na yujyate tathā pūrvamevāviṣkṛtam |
XXvabhdicu:4212: vaiśeṣiko manyate- kapāleṣvavidyamānaṃ ghaṭadravyaṃ tantuṣu cāvidyamānaṃ paṭadravyaṃ kapālatantusaṃyogādutpadyate
XXvabhdicu:4217: mukhyasattā guṇābhāvādgauṇī sattā na vidyate // Abhidh-d_310 //
XXvabhdicu:4218: na hi mukhyasattāyāṃ guṇābhāve 'vayavābhāve vā kāraṇeṣu prāgutpattyabhāve
XXvabhdicu:4222: tadyathā madhuravāgdevadatta iti vāci mādhuryaguṇayuktasya guḍadravyasya madhuno vā sādharmyamabhilaṣaṇīyatā vidyate ityato vāci mādhuryaśabdaḥ prayujyate |
XXvabhdicu:4223: kanyāmukhe ca candrakāntisādṛśyaṃ dṛṣṭvā candraśabdaḥ prayujyate |
XXvabhdicu:4224: vāhīke ca jāḍyasādharmyādgośabdaḥ prayujyate- gaurayaṃ vāhīka ityevamādi |
XXvabhdicu:4225: na ca tathā kaścidaguṇāvayavagandho 'pi tantuṣu tatsaṃyoge vā
XXvabhdicu:4229: prāgavyapadeśyaṃ vastumātraṃ viprakṛtaṃ jāyata iti cet |
XXvabhdicu:4237: tadyathā dārako mukhyasattāviṣṭo mātṛkukṣerniṣkramaṇe jāyata ityucyate |
XXvabhdicu:4239: dārṣṭāntikaḥ khalu brūte- kāraṇaśaktiṣu nirātmakajanikartrupacāraḥ pravartate |
XXvabhdicu:4242: svabhāvo yadi bhāvanāṃ prāgabhūtvā samudbhavet // Abhidh-d_312 //
XXvabhdicu:4250: vada somya kathaṃ yāti pratītyā vastu vastutām // Abhidh-d_313 //
XXvabhdicu:4251: iha khalu bhavatāmahetuko vināśaḥ sarvotpattimatāṃ nityasaṃnihitaḥ |
XXvabhdicu:4252: tasmiṃśca sati janmasthitiśaktikriyā na vidyante, virodhāt |
XXvabhdicu:4254: tadasminnasati kiṃ pratītya asannirātmakaṃ vastu vastutāṃ yātītyācakṣva |
XXvabhdicu:4257: atha tavābhāvo na kaścidasti bhāvavirodhī, kathaṃ tarhi sa bhāvo naṣṭa ityucyate ? tasmādbhavato vāṅmātrametat, mama tu vidyamānayorevopakāryupakārakabhāvo yuktaḥ |
XXvabhdicu:4261: anugrahopaghātayośca kāryakāraṇasaṃbandhopacāraśca satoreva bhavatītyāstanandhayebhyaḥ prasiddhametat, nāsatoḥ na ca sadasatoriti ||
XXvabhdicu:4264: yatkhalu nisvabhāvaṃ nirātmakaṃ hetūnpratītya jāyate tasya khalu svabhāvo nāsti |
XXvabhdicu:4265: na hi tatkāraṇeṣu pratyekamavasthitaṃ nāpi bhāgaśo nāpyanyatra kvacit |
XXvabhdicu:4267: yacca na kvacidasti tatkatamena svabhāvenotpatsyata iti nāsti svabhāvaḥ |
XXvabhdicu:4268: yasya ca nāsti svabhāvaḥ tatkathamastītyucyate ? tasmādalātacakravannisvabhāvatvāt sarvadharmā nirātmāna iti |
XXvabhdicu:4274: tasya tarhi hetavo vidyamānasya kamupakāraṃ kurvantīti ? atrābhidhīyate |
XXvabhdicu:4275: na khalu dravyasvabhāvāstitvaṃ prati kañcidupakāraṃ kurvanti |
XXvabhdicu:4280: tadyathābhijātasya rājaputrasya vidyamānasya mantriṇaḥ sabalasamudayāḥ parigrahānugrahamātreṇopakurvanto rājatvaṃ kurvantyevamanāgatasya vastunaḥ sato hetupratyayāḥ sametya lakṣaṇamātraṃ vartamānākhyamaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kurvantītyavaboddhavyam ||
XXvabhdicu:4284: yathā khalu paramāṇusaṃcayaścakṣuṣā gṛhyate, pratyekaṃ paramāṇavo na
XXvabhdicu:4285: gṛhyante, tathā kāraṇasāmagrye sati dharmāṇāṃ kriyāsāmarthyamupajāyata iti
XXvabhdicu:4293: yastu manyate 'tītaṃ karmābhāvībhavatyanāgataṃ ca na vidyate taṃ pratyapadiśyate-
XXvabhdicu:4298: atra pratyavatiṣṭhante dārṣṭāntikāḥ- na brūmaḥ sarvathātītaṃ na vidyate |
XXvabhdicu:4299: kiṃ tarhi ? dravyātmanā na vidyate prajñaptyātmanā tu saditi |
XXvabhdicu:4307: yadi tarhyanāgataṃ cakṣurādidravyaṃ vidyate kasmānna paśyati na dṛśyate na vijānāti ? na vyaktaṃ kāritrābhāvāditi ||
XXvabhdicu:4309: ko vighnaḥ yadi cakṣurvidyate kiṃ na paśyati ? vayaṃ brūmaḥ-
XXvabhdicu:4310: aṅgavaikalyam dṛṣṭaṃ hi pradīpādyaṅgavaikalye vartamānasyāpi cakṣuṣo rūpādarśanam |
XXvabhdicu:4311: sa pratyācaṣṭe- sarvasya sadāstitve kuto 'ṅgavaikalyam ? vayamācakṣmahe-
XXvabhdicu:4314: tatra keṣāñcidasāṃnidhyaṃ bhavati tadvaikalyātkāritraṃ na karotīti |
XXvabhdicu:4317: kiṃ lakṣaṇātkāritraṃ tato vā dravyāt, kimanyadāhosvidananyaditi ? tatra vayaṃ prativadmaḥ-
XXvabhdicu:4318: śrūyatāṃ sadbhyaḥ chātrāsanamadhyāsya na hi sarvajñapravacanagāmbhīryaṃ sadevakenāpi lokena śakyaṃ tarkamātreṇāvaboddhum |
XXvabhdicu:4324: anāgatasya khalu dharmasya vartamānādhvasaṃpātādantaraṅgavahiraṅgasāmagryāṅgaparigrahāt labdhasāmarthyasya dharmasya yaḥ phalākṣepastatkāritramityucyate |
XXvabhdicu:4331: yadi dravyātmano nānyathātvaṃ kiṃ tarhi hetūn pratītya jāyate ? brūmaḥ-
XXvabhdicu:4333: tathā śaktistathā velā tathā sattā tathā kriyā // Abhidh-d_323 //
XXvabhdicu:4340: atra sarvāstivādavibhraṣṭirvaituliko nirāha- vayamapi trīn svabhāvān
XXvabhdicu:4344: yastu vidvanmanogrāhī parikalpaḥ sa durlabhaḥ // Abhidh-d_324 //
XXvabhdicu:4345: te khalvete bhavatkalpitāstrayaḥ svabhāvāḥ pūrvameva pratyūḍhāḥ |
XXvabhdicu:4354: yasmi vā vastuni saṃyukto 'prahīṇaṃ tasya tadvastu ?
XXvabhdicu:4356: syādvastuni saṃyukto na ca tadvastvaprahīṇaṃ yathā tāvaddarśanamārge |
XXvabhdicu:4358: duḥkhajñāne utpanne samudayajñāne cānutpanne duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyaṃ vastu prahīṇaṃ bhavati
XXvabhdicu:4363: navānāṃ prakārāṇāṃ yo yaḥ prakāraḥ pūrva prahīṇastasminprahīṇe 'pi
XXvabhdicu:4365: atha kasminvastuni katyanuśayā anuśerate ? atra cālambananiyama eva
XXvabhdicu:4367: katamo dharmaḥ katamasya vijñānasyālambanam ? tata eva tadvispaṣṭaṃ gamyate- amuṣminvastuni iyanto 'nuśayā anuśerata iti |
XXvabhdicu:4370: pañcadhā nirmalāścaiva vijñānāni tathaiva ca // Abhidh-d_326 //
XXvabhdicu:4371: dharmāstāvat kāmarūpārūpyadhātuṣu pratyekaṃ pañcaprakārā duḥkhādidarśanaheyā apraheyāśca nirmalā iti ṣoḍaśa bhavanti |
XXvabhdicu:4376: dharmasaṃgrahavijñāne vā pṛṣṭo dhātvāyatanaskandheṣu pātayitvā lakṣayet |
XXvabhdicu:4382: kasya vijñānasya katame dharmā gocarā iti ? tadāviṣkriyate-
XXvabhdicu:4385: kāmāvacarāḥ khalu duḥkhasamudayadarśanabhāvanāprahātavyā dharmāḥ pratyekaṃ pañcānāṃ vijñānānāṃ gocarībhavanti |
XXvabhdicu:4386: katameṣāṃ pañcānām ? sveṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ kāmāvacarasya duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyasya vijñānasyālambanam
XXvabhdicu:4389: ekasya ca rūpāptasya bhāvanāprahātavyasya kuśalasyānāsravasya ceti |
XXvabhdicu:4391: eta eva trayo dharmāḥ ātmīyādhastrayaikordhvanirmalānāṃ tu rūpajāḥ /
XXvabhdicu:4392: rupāvacaro hi duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyo dharmaḥ aṣṭānāṃ vijñānānāmālambanam
XXvabhdicu:4396: bhāvanāprahātavyasya ca kuśalasya ūrdhvaikasyārūpyāvacarasya bhāvanāprahātavyasya kuśalasyānāsravasya ca |
XXvabhdicu:4399: ārūpyāvacarāsta eva trayo dharmāḥ, daśānāṃ vijñānānāmālambanam |
XXvabhdicu:4401: ityevaṃ tāvat traidhātukāḥ duḥkhasamudayadarśanaheyābhāvanāheyāśca dharmā uktāḥ ||
XXvabhdicu:4403: sarva eva traidhātukāḥ nirodhamārgadarśanaheyāḥ svanaikāyikādhikacittagocarā vijñātavyāḥ |
XXvabhdicu:4404: kāmāvacaro hi nirodhadarśanaprahātavyo dharmo duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyādivat pañcānāṃ vijñānānāmālambanam
XXvabhdicu:4407: rūpāvacarau nirodhamārgadarśanaprahātavyau pūrvavadaṣṭānāṃ vijñānānāṃ pratyekamālambanaṃ svanaikāyikasya cādhikasyeti navānām |
XXvabhdicu:4411: traidhātukānāṃ pañcānāṃ prakārāṇāṃ pratyekaṃ ye 'ntyāstrayaḥ prakārā
XXvabhdicu:4416: ārupyāptaṃ daśānāṃ tu daśānāmeva cāmalam // Abhidh-d_331 //
